abstract: PBS said Wednesday that it would move “Independent Lens” and “POV” to Monday night and begin promotional efforts to recover the audience that was lost this season after the series moved to Thursday nights.
snippet: PBS said Wednesday that it would move “Independent Lens” and “POV” to Monday night and begin promotional efforts to recover the audience that was lost this season after the series moved to Thursday nights.
lead_paragraph: 4:43 p.m. | Updated Just weeks after hundreds of independent filmmakers protested a scheduling change for two award-winning independent film series on PBS, the broadcaster said Wednesday that it would move both series, “Independent Lens” and “POV,” to a Monday night slot and begin promotional efforts to recover viewers who were lost this season.

headline.main: PBS Will Move Series of Films to Monday Night
